name: Plumter
headline: Easy foreign payments for African merchants
description: We're providing payment rails to help African merchants and consumers easily pay their suppliers abroad.

founders.name: Yinka Elujoba, Founder
founders.description: I just want to do my work and leave.

raw_markdown="[![P](https://plumter.com/assets/media/image/logo.png)![P](https://plumter.com/assets/media/image/logo-white.png)](https://plumter.com/</>)
Company
[Pricing](https://plumter.com/</pricing/>)[About Us](https://plumter.com/</#>)
Resources

[Customers](https://plumter.com/</customer-stories/>)[Contact Us](https://plumter.com/</contact/>)[Log In](https://plumter.com/<https:/trade.plumter.com/login>)[Request Access](https://plumter.com/<https:/trade.plumter.com/request-access>)
![P](https://plumter.com/assets/media/image/flags.png)
# Pay your suppliers in over 100 countries
Plumter helps businesses make global payments in more than 120 currencies at the fastest speed and best rates.
[![P](https://plumter.com/assets/media/image/play-store-m.png)![P](https://plumter.com/assets/media/image/play-store.png)](https://plumter.com/<https:/play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.plumter.business>)[![P](https://plumter.com/assets/media/image/apple-store-m.png)![P](https://plumter.com/assets/media/image/apple-store.png)](https://plumter.com/<https:/apps.apple.com/us/app/plumter/6443742831>)
![](https://plumter.com/assets/media/image/hero-2.png)
#### 120+
Currencies Available
#### 1650+
Businesses Served
#### 95%
payments completed in < 48 hours
#### Better than your traditional bank Robust & Elegant.
Packed with modern features guaranteed to make life easier for your finance team, and a delightful experience for your business
![Available on Web & Mobile](https://plumter.com/assets/media/image/platform-bg-md.png)![Available on Web & Mobile](https://plumter.com/assets/media/image/platform-0.png)
###### Available on Web & Mobile
With our easy to use desktop and mobile apps, you can process your transactions without entering a bank or leaving your bed
![See Exchange Rates for over 120 Currencies ](https://plumter.com/assets/media/image/platform-bg-sm.png)![See Exchange Rates for over 120 Currencies ](https://plumter.com/assets/media/image/platform-1.png)
###### See Exchange Rates for over 120 Currencies 
Instantly access over 120 currencies with even more currency pairs to enable you make fast decisions
![Detailed reporting and statements](https://plumter.com/assets/media/image/platform-bg-sm.png)![Detailed reporting and statements](https://plumter.com/assets/media/image/platform-2.png)
###### Detailed reporting and statements
See details of how your business is doing and how your money is moving. Easily download statements and reports to help you monitor and manage your transactions.
![Instant Tracking Information](https://plumter.com/assets/media/image/platform-bg-md.png)![Instant Tracking Information](https://plumter.com/assets/media/image/platform-3.png)
###### Instant Tracking Information
Get instant visibility on what is happening with your payments at every step of the way with immediate access to UETRs, OMADs and IMADs for tracking.
![Teammates and Roles](https://plumter.com/assets/media/image/platform-bg-md.png)![Teammates and Roles](https://plumter.com/assets/media/image/platform-4.png)
###### Teammates and Roles
Easily onboard other members of your team or company and delegate roles. Decide who can create payments, approve them, or simply view them.
![Notifications and Updates](https://plumter.com/assets/media/image/platform-bg-sm.png)![Notifications and Updates](https://plumter.com/assets/media/image/platform-5.png)
###### Notifications and Updates
Receive real time updates on exchange rates so you can make wise and quick decisions, or get notified when the status of your payment changes.
##### Why Use Plumter?
More reasons to join the winning team
#### Compliant and Secure
We work with global partners and fully licensed banks to ensure your funds are transmitted securely and in a compliant way.
#### Robust pool of Liquidity
Regardless of whatever amounts you are sending in whatever currency, Plumter gives your business access to a robust liquidity through our direct connection to global bank partners.
#### Solid customer support
Our support team provides equal dedication to all customers, making sure that any issue you may face is speedily resolved.
##### Tested and trusted by thousands of businesses
Our customers range from small importers to large multinationals. See what they're saying about Plumter
Using Plumter has been a game-changer for our business. The real-time rates and ability to make payments in multiple currencies and several countries have saved us both time and money. Highly recommended!
![](https://plumter.com/assets/media/image/rofeeah-bello-sm.png)
Operations Executive, Olayfis Global Resources
Plumter has greatly improved the effectiveness of our international payments. With its intuitive dashboard and automated features, we can conveniently monitor and track our payments in real-time. Plumter provides a transparent and cost-effective solution, helping us optimise our cash flow and supplier relationships.
![](https://plumter.com/assets/media/image/dapo-sobayo-sm.png)
COO, Rank Capital Limited
“Speedy settlement is one of the main reasons we chose Plumter. It has significantly reduced our payment processing time, allowing us to focus on other aspects of our business.”
![](https://plumter.com/assets/media/image/isiaka-ibrahim-sm.png)
CEO, Sintita Enterprise
“I have been using Plumter for my cross-border payments for months now, and I am impressed by their excellent customer support. They are always available to assist and provide guidance whenever needed.”
![](https://plumter.com/assets/media/image/maryjane-akujieze-sm.png)
CEO, Gefallen Enterprises
[Read More Customer Stories](https://plumter.com/</customer-stories/>)
##### Get Started with our API
Bring the full power of the most robust global payments infrastructure into your system to make payments even easier and more flexible for you.
Transact from within your own system your way
Access to 120 global rates in realtime
Tools to help you scale your team even more at your own pace
Contact Sales
![](https://plumter.com/assets/media/image/api-image.png)
##### Download our App
Get the best experience on our mobile app. Download for Android & iOS devices now.
[![P](https://plumter.com/assets/media/image/play-store-t.png)](https://plumter.com/<https:/play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.plumter.business>)[![P](https://plumter.com/assets/media/image/apple-store-t.png)](https://plumter.com/<https:/apps.apple.com/us/app/plumter/6443742831>)
![](https://plumter.com/assets/media/image/app-view.png)
###### Company
[About Us](https://plumter.com/</#>)[Testimonials](https://plumter.com/</customer-stories/>)[Pricing](https://plumter.com/</pricing/>)
###### Resources

###### Contact
[+1 914-520-0397](https://plumter.com/<tel:+19145200397>)

![](https://plumter.com/assets/media/image/ventures-platform.png)
###### Follow Us

generated_description:
**Plumter: Simplifying Global Payments for African Merchants**

Founded in 2021 and based in Lagos, Nigeria, Plumter is on a mission to streamline foreign payments for African merchants, enabling them to easily pay their suppliers around the world. As a proud member of Y Combinator’s Winter 2022 Batch, Plumter taps into cutting-edge technology to enhance the financial landscape in Africa. 

### What Plumter Offers
Plumter acts as a fintech conduit, providing payment rails that allow businesses to transact in over 120 currencies, minimizing the complexity typically associated with international payments. Here are some key aspects:

1. **Speed and Efficiency**: An impressive 95% of payments are completed in less than 48 hours, far surpassing traditional banking services.
2. **User-Friendly Interface**: Both desktop and mobile applications simplify transaction processing, enabling users to handle payments comfortably from anywhere.
3. **Robust Reporting Tools**: Businesses can closely monitor their financial activities with detailed statements and real-time tracking information.
4. **Extensive Currency Coverage**: With more than 120 currencies available, Plumter caters to a diverse range of businesses, whether small importers or large multinationals.
5. **Customer Support**: Their dedicated support team ensures issues are resolved promptly, fostering a reliable experience for users.

### Empowering Businesses
Plumter currently serves over 1,650 businesses, showcasing its ability to scale and adapt to the needs of various clients. Users have praised the platform for its real-time exchange rates and the ability to manage payments seamlessly, which translates into improved cash flow and supplier relationships.

### Backed by Experience
Michael Seibel, a notable figure in the tech community, serves as Plumter’s Group Partner, providing strategic guidance that helps the startup navigate the competitive fintech landscape.

Whether you're a local business looking to expand internationally or a multinational in need of agile payment solutions, Plumter positions itself as an essential ally in cross-border trade. Its commitment to compliance, security, and robust liquidity access makes it a reliable choice for modern businesses looking to simplify their international payment processes.

For more information and to explore the platform, visit [Plumter's website](https://plumter.com).
